code: import{useEffect}from'react';import useBrandName from'./useBrandName';export default function useTitle(title){var brandName=useBrandName();useEffect(function(){var prevTitle=document.title;if(title){document.title="".concat(brandName," | ").concat(title);}else{document.title=brandName;}return function(){document.title=prevTitle;};},[title,brandName]);}
